bug.question: I have six legs and love to build honeycombs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I collect nectar from flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🐝 I make something sweet and yellow.

bug.question: I hop around and chirp loudly, especially in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My sound is very distinctive during hot weather.
🌿 I have strong legs for jumping.
☀️ I like warm, sunny places.

bug.question: I have spots and can fly, and I'm considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My name has a title and a small person in it.
🔴 I am often red with black dots.
✨ People like to make a wish when they see me.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home can be sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🌙 I often hide during the day and come out at night.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 We live in colonies.
💪 I'm very small, but I can lift things much heavier than myself.
🍫 I especially like sweets that fall on the ground.

bug.question: I flap my colourful wings and drink nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
🌸 I am beautiful and fly around flowers.
🐛 First, I eat a lot of leaves.

bug.question: I light up the night with my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 My light is bioluminescent.
🔦 I am neither fire nor a fly.
🌃 You can see me best when it's dark.

bug.question: I eat wood and build tunnels underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I am often found eating the support structure of buildings.
🌳 I am the bane of many houses.
🐜 I am like an ant, but I eat wood.

bug.question: I can walk on water with my long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I glide across the surface of ponds and lakes.
⛸️ I am lightweight and distribute my weight evenly.
🐛 My feet are hydrophobic

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and drink blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be very annoying in the summer.
🧛 I often bite at night.
🩸 Only the females of my species need blood.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest and brightest star in our solar system. I give light and warmth to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I appear every day, lighting our days
🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's natural satellite. I shine at night by reflecting the sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I have phases, sometimes full, sometimes crescent.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🌑 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that makes its own light. I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🌌 The sun is an example of me.
🔭 We can see me with telescopes.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I am covered in land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I have living things on me.
💧 I am mostly water.
🌱 Plants and animals live on me

cosmos.question: I am known as the 'Red Planet'. I am smaller than Earth and have a rocky surface. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Rovers have explored my surface.
🔴 I appear reddish in the sky.
👽 People want to find life on me.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. I have a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am a gas giant.
🌪️ My red spot is a huge storm.
🌔 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. The rings are made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I am a gas giant.
🧊 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🌌 I am very light and less dense than water (if I was able to fit in water)

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a pattern in the sky. People use me to navigate. What am I?

hints.text: ursa I am a group of stars
✨ You can find me in the night sky.
🧭 Sailors used me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of billions of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
✨ I contain many stars, including our Sun
💫 I can be spiral shaped.

cosmos.question: I am a giant explosion of a star. I am one of the most powerful events in the universe. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I create a lot of light and energy.
⭐ I am the end of a star's life for some stars.
🌑 I can create elements heavier than iron.
